item.description:
Hello Everyone -

Wow how the time flies!! It's time for our first kayaking adventure of the season. Come join us and put your paddle in the water for a fabulous time ;-) This time we're going to try the Charles River in Newton. It's only a short 30 minute drive from the South Shore, right off Route 128 - easy to find and plenty of parking!!!

The trip is a quite leisure 2-3 hour paddle on flat water, great for beginners and beyond with a place to stop off to take a break or have a snack.

NOTE DETAILS:

Items to Bring:

  • CASH to pay for rental ($15 per hour pp) - we get a $5 discount if I pay for all
  • Must be 18+ - anyone under 21 must be accompanied by an adult family member
  • snack/lunch & beverage
  • plenty of water
  • sunscreen
  • hat
  • No alcohol
  • a smile for a good time


Bringing your own boat:

  • need your own PFD, paddle & whistle
  • drop boat off at launch before parking for ease of transport


DIRECTIONS

WEATHER: Event will be cancelled due to bad weather. Be sure to look @ your emails either Friday night or Saturday morning for cancellation notice from me.

CARPOOL: I have room for 3 in my car if someone would like to carpool. Just send me a note. Others that wish to carpool can make mention in the comment section when RSVP'ing and you can email one another to coordinate.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to kayaks and/or kayak equipment. Personal flotation devices (PFDs) are required for all participants.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Kayaking on the Charles
